name: Repulsion Armor Plate
description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 {+5}. Cannot be reduced below 1.

name: Mocha
description: Increases attack speed by 7.5% {+7.5%} and movement speed by 7% {+7%}.

name: Topaz Brooch
description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health {+15}.

name: Tougher Times
description:
15% {+15%} chance to block incoming damage.
Unaffected by the luck.
unlock: Die 5 times.

name: Trip-Tip Dagger
description: 10% {+10%} chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
description: Deal an additional 20% damage {+20%} to bosses.
unlock: Complete a Teleporter event.

name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
description: Your attacks have a 10% {+10%} chance to "Critically Strike", dealing double damage.

name: Crowbar
description: Deal 75% {+75%} damage to enemies above 90% health.
unlock: Discover 10 unique white items.

name: Bundle of Fireworks
description: Activating an interactable launches 8 {+4} fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
unlock: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D printer.

name: Fresh Meat
description: Increases maximum health by 25 {+25}.

name: Delicate Watch
description: Increase damage by 20% {+20%}. Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

name: Roll of Pennies
description: Gain 3 {+3} gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

name: Cautious Slug
description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s {+3 hp/s} while outside of combat.

name: Power Elixir
description: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
description: Increases movement speed by 14% {+14%}.
unlock: Fail the Shrine of chance 3 times in a row.

name: Gasoline
description:
Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m {+4m}.
Enemies burn for 150% {+75%} base damage.

name: Medkit
description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% {+5%} of maximum health.
unlock: Defeat an Elite-type monster.

name: Bustling Fungus
description: After standing still for 1 seconds create a zone that heals for 4.5% {+2.25%} of your health every second to all allies within 3m {+1.5m}.

name: Focus Crystal
description: Increase damage to enemies withing 13m by 20% {+20%}.

name: Oddly-shaped Opal
description: Increase armor by 100 {+100} while out of danger.

name: Personal Shield Generator
description: Gain a shield equal to 8% {+8%} of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

name: Item Scrap, White
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Backup Magazine
description: Add +1 {+1} charge of your Secondary skill.
unlock: Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit.

name: Energy Drink
description: Sprint speed is improved by 25% {+25%}.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: 5% {+5%} chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

name: Stun Grenade
description: 5% {+5%} chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Soldier's Syringe
description: Increase Attack Speed by 15% {+15%}.

name: Monster Tooth
description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% {+2%} of maximum health.

name: Rusted Key
description:
A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage.
Opening the cache {consumes} this item.
unlock: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

name: Warbanner
description:
On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m {+8m}.
Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

name: Predatory Instincts
description:
Critical Strikes increase attack speed by 12%.
Maximum cap of 36% {+24%} attack speed.
unlock: Reach +200% attack speed.

name: Bandolier
description: 18% {+10%} chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all cooldowns.

name: Ghor's Tome
description: 4% {+4%} chance on kill to drop a treasure worth 25$. Scales over time.

name: Ukulele
description: 25% chance to fire a chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage up to 3 {+2} targets within 20m {+2m}.

name: Death Mark
description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 {+7} seconds.

name: War Horn
description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s {+4s}.
unlock: Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage.

name: Fuel Cell
description:
Hold an additional equipment charge {+1}.
Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% {+15%}.
unlock: Pickup 5 different types of Equipment.

name: Old Guillotine
description: Instantly kill Elite Monsters below 13% {+13%} health.
unlock: Defeat 500 Elite Monsters.

name: Will-O'-the-wisp
description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m {+2.4m} radius for 350% {+280%} base damage.

name: Hopoo Feather
description: Gain +1 {+1} maximum jump count.

name: Kjaro's Band
description: Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% {+300%} TOTAL damage over time. Recharge every 10 seconds.
unlock: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

name: Shipping Request Form
description: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. {Increases rarity chances of the items}.

name: Harvester's Scythe
description:
Gain 5% critical chance.
Critical strikes heal for 8 {+4} health.
unlock: Complete a Prismatic Trial.

name: Runald's Band
description: Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s {+3s} and dealing 250% {+250%} TOTAL damage. Recharge every 10 seconds.
unlock: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

name: Infusion
description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 {+1}, up to a maximum of 100 {+100} health.
unlock: Defeat 3000 enemies.

name: Wax Quail
description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m {+10m}.
unlock: Reach +300% movespeed (include sprinting).

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% {+300%} TOTAL damage.

name: Hunter's Harpoon
description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 {+0.5} seconds.

name: Old War Stealthkit
description:
Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s.
Recharges every 30 seconds {-50%}.

name: Shuriken
description: Activation your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% {+100%} base damage. You can hold up to 3 {+1} shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

name: Regenerating Scrap
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

name: Item Scrap, Green
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Leeching Seed
description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 {+1} health.

name: Chronobauble
description: Slow enemies for -60% movement speed for 2s {+2s}.

name: Rose Buckler
description: Increase armor by 30 {+30} while sprinting.

name: Red Whip
description: Leaving combat boosts movement speed by 30% {+30%}.

name: Squid Polyp
description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% {+100%} attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.
unlock: Activate 6 turrets in a single run.

name: Ignition Tank
description: Ignite effects deal +300% {+300%} more damage over time.

name: Lepton Daisy
description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 {+1} times.

name: Razorwire
description:
Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage.
Hits up to 5 {+2} targets in a 25m {+10m} radius.

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
description:
Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s {+4s}.
Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
unlock: Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health.

name: Alien Head
description: Reduce skill cooldown by 25% {+25%}.

name: Shattering Justice
description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 {+8} seconds.

name: Aegis
description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for up to 50% {+50%} of the amount you healed.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
description: All your attacks explode in a 4m {+1.5m} radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

name: Sentient Meat Hook
description: 20% {+20%} chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 {+5} enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
unlock: Loop back to the first stage.

name: Defensive Microbots
description: Shoot down 1 {+1} projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
description: All random effects are rolled +1 {+1} times for a favorable outcome.
unlock: Complete 20 stages in a single run.

name: Laser scope
description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage {+100%}

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% {+150%} base damage.

name: Spare Drone Parts
description:
Gain Col. Droneman.
Drones gain +50% {+50%} attack speed and cooldown reduction.
Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage.
Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

name: Dio's Best Friend
description: Upon Death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
unlock: Stay alive for 30 consecutive minutes.

name: H3AD-5T v2
description:
Increase jump height.
Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance.
Recharges in 10 {-50%} seconds.

name: Happiest Mask
description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s {+30s}.

name: Wake of Vultures
description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s {+5s}.

name: Frost Relic
description:
Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s.
The storm grows with every kill, increasing it's radius by 2m.
Stacks up to 18m {+12m}.

name: Ben's Raincoat
description: Whenever you would receive a debuff, prevent it. Increases maximum health by 100 {+100}.

name: Rejuvenation Rack
unlock: Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event.

name: Brainstalks
description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s {+4s} where skills have no cooldowns.
unlock: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

name: Resonance Disc
description:
Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc.
The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage {+300%}, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage {+1000%}.
Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage {+300%}.

name: Pocket I.C.B.M
description: All missile items and equipments fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% {+50%}.

name: N'kuhana's Opinion
description:
Store 100% {+100%} of healing as Soul Energy.
After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
unlock: Find the Altar to N'kuhana.

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
description: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 {+2} permanently.

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
description:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.
The plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies withing 5m {+5m}. Last 10 seconds.

name: Bottled Chaos
description: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 {+1} time(s).

name: Item Scrap, Red
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
description:
Fire out lightning that hits 3 {+2} enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s.
The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
unlock: Deal 5000 damage in one shot.

name: Soulbound Catalyst
description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s {+2s}.
unlock: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

name: Hardlight Afterburner
description:
Add +2 {+2} charges of your Utility skill.
Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

name: Artifact Key
description: A stone shard with immense power.

name: Queen's Gland
description:
Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health.
Can have up to 1 {+1} Guards at a time.

name: Shatterspleen
description: Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% {+400%} damage, plus an additional 15% {+15%} of their maximum health.

name: Molten Perforator
description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% {+300%} damage and igniting all enemies.

name: Titanic Knurl
description: Increases maximum health by 40 {+40} and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s {+1.6 hp/s}.

name: Charged Perforator
description: 10% chance on hit to do down a lightning strike, dealing 500% {+500%} damage.

name: Defense Nucleus
description: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 {+4}.

name: Genesis Loop
description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds {-50%}.

name: Planula
description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 {+15}

name: Pearl
description: Increases maximum health by 10% {+10%}.

name: Empathy Cores
description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% {+100%} damage per ally on your team.

name: Item Scrap, Yellow
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Irradiant Pearl
description: Increases ALL stats by 10% {+10%}.

name: Mired Urn
description: While in combat, the nearest 1 {+1} characters to you within 13m will be "tethered" to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing your for 100% of the damage dealt.

name: Little Disciple
description:
Fire a tracking wisp for 300% {+300%} damage.
Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

name: Halcyon Seed
description:
Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event.
It has 100% {+50%} damage and 100% {+100%} health.

name: Safer Spaces
description:
Block incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds {-10%}.
Corrupts all Tougher Times.

name: Needletick
description:
10% {+10%} chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage.
Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

name: Lost Seer's Lenses
description:
Your attacks have a 0.5% {+0.5%} chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy.
Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

name: Weeping Fungus
description:
Heals for 2% {+2%} of your health every second while sprinting.
Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

name: Encrusted Key
description:
A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.
Corrupts all Rusted Key.

name: Polylute
description:
25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 {+3} times.
Corrupts all Ukuleles.

name: Singularity Band
description:
Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center.
Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% {+100%} TOTAL damage.
Recharges every 20 seconds.
Corrupts all Kjaro's Band and Runald's Band.

name: Lysate Cell
description:
Add +1 {+1} charge of your Special skill.
Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

name: Voidsent Flame
description:
Upon hitting an enemy at or above 90% health, detonate them in a 12m {+2.4m} radius burst for 260% {+156%} base damage.
Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

name: Plasma Shrimp
description:
Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% {+50%} TOTAL damage.
Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

name: Tentabauble
description:
5% {+5%} chance on hit to root enemies for 1s {+1s}.
Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

name: Benthic Bloom
description:
Upgrades 3 {+3} randoms items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage.
Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

name: Pluripotent Larva
description:
Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be.
Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

name: Newly Hatched Zoea
description:
Every 60 {-50%} seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 {+1} allies at a time.
Corrupts all Unique Items.

name: Gesture of the Drowned
description:
Reduce equipment cooldown by 50% {+15%}.
Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
unlock: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

name: Focused Convergence
description: Teleporters charge 30% {+30%} faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% {-50%} smaller.
unlock: In 4 consecutive stages, don't leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

name: Brittle Crown
description:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 {+2} gold. Scales over time.
Lose gold equal to 100% {+100%} of amount your are hit for OR lose % gold equal to 100% {+100%} of the maximum health % you lost.
Chooses the greater of the two.

name: Light Flux Pauldron
description: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% {+50%}. Decrease attack speed by 50% {+50%}.

name: Stone Flux Pauldron
description: Increase max health by 100% {+100%}. Reduce movement speed by 50% {+50%}.

name: Purity
description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 {+1} seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 {+1} times for an unfavorable outcome.
unlock: Beat the game in Monsoon difficulty.

name: Shaped Glass
description:
Increase base damage by 100% {+100%}.
Reduce maximum health by 50% {+50%}.

name: Visions of Heresy
description:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.
Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges {+12} that reload after 2 seconds {+2}.

name: Hook of Heresy
description:
Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.
Charge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 {+3} seconds. Recharges after 5 {+5} seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Essence of Heresy
description:
Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.
Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 {+10} seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stack at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin.
Recharges after 8 {+8} seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Egocentrism
description:
Every 3 {-50%} seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 {+1} bombs.
Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

name: Beads of Fealty
description: Seems to do nothing... but...
unlock: Unlock the new zone from the "Hidden Realms" update when you obliterate with this item.

name: Strides of Heresy
description:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.
Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% {+25%} of your maximum health. Lasts 3 {+3} seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Defiant Gouge
description: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby. Scales over time.

name: Mercurial Rachis
description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m {+50%}, causing them to deal +50% damage.

name: Eulogy Zero
description: Items have a 5% {+5%} chance to become a Lunar item instead.

name: Corpsebloom
description:
Heal +100% {+100%} more.
All healing is applied over time.
Can heal for a maximum of 10% {-50%} of your health per second.

name: Transcendence
description:
Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields.
Gain 50% {+25%} maximum health.

name: Helfire Tincture
description:
Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself.
The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.
Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Kill 15 enemies simultaneously.

name: Effigy of Grief
description:
ALL characters are slowed by 50% and has their armor reduced by 20.
Can place up to 5.
Cooldown: 15s

name: Glowing Meteorite
description:
Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast.
Last 20 seconds.
unlock: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

name: Spinel Affliction
description:
Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 15 seconds.
Increases damage by +100%.
Increases attack speed by +70%.
Increases armor by +20.
Increases maximum health by +50%.
Increases passive health regeneration by +300%.
Increases movespeed by +30%.
When the tonic wears off, you have 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% {-5%}
unlock: Discover and enter three unique portals.

name: Preon Accumulator
description:
Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m up to 600% damage/second.
On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.
Cooldown: 140s
unlock: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

name: Blackhole
description:
Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into it's center. Last 10 seconds.
Cooldown: 60s

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
description: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

name: Blast Shower
description:
Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.
Cooldown: 20s
unlock: Die three fiery deaths.

name: Disposable Missile Launcher
description:
Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Ocular HUD
description:
Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 60s

name: Forgive Me Please
description:
Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 45
unlock: Die 20 times.

name: The Back-up
description:
Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you.
Last 25 seconds.
Cooldown: 100s
unlock: Repair 30 drones or turrets.

name: Volcania Egg
description:
Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact.
Detonates at the end for 800% damage.
Cooldown: 30s

name: Foreign Fruit
description:
Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Jade Elephant
description:
Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Eccentric Vase
description:
Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Defeat the guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.

name: The Crowdfunder
description:
Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet.
Costs $1 per bullet. Costs increases over time.
Cooldown: 5s
unlock: Collect $30,480 total gold.

name: Goobo Jr.
description:
Spawn a gummy clone that has 700% damage and 700% health. Expires in 30 seconds.
Cooldown: 100s

name: Milky Chrisalis
description:
Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds.
Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.
Cooldown: 60s

name: Super Massive Leech
description:
Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 60s

name: Royal Capacitor
description:
Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
Cooldown: 20s
unlock: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain.

name: Molotov (6-Pack)
description:
Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Executive Card
description:
Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remaing open.
Cooldown: 0.1s

name: Gnarled Woodsprite
description:
Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals a friendly target for 10% of their maximum health instantly, then 1.5% of your maximum health every second.
Activating the equipment assigns a new target, or yourself if there are no targets available.
Cooldown: 15s
unlock: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

name: Recycler
description:
Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted in the same tier one time.
Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Destroy  20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

name: Sawmerang
description:
Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage.
Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies.
Can strike enemies again on the way back.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Radar Scanner
description:
Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.
Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

name: Gorag's Opus
description:
All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Cooldown: 45s

name: Remote Caffeinator
description:
Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.
Cooldown: 60s
